TopicTitle: 0 Delta V even though the tanks are full.

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.3.2 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 11 | CPU: AMD Ryzen 7 6800H with Radeon Graphics. | GPU: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 Ti Laptop | RAM: 40 GB

 

The staging bar would constanly (after staging in orbit) say that my delta-v was 0 even though I hadn't even burned an engine or used the tanks.

This was frustrating as this was my first inter-planetary rocket and due to the new "no fuel no maneuver" feature I couldn't get maneuver nodes to work.

 

Edited July 31, 2023 by Anth12
I've seen this bug myself. It's quite annoying. Did you try an f5/f9 to see if that resolves it? As I recall that usually does.
